title: 关于水桶服问题
author: 小伟0.0
txt_content:
新人求教，如何解决，应该是启动.bat 文件装载后出现的
174recipes
27 achievements
20:03:25[信息]Starting minecraft xxxxxxxxxx
20:03:25[信息]lording xxxxxx
20:03:25[信息]Starting minecraft server on 192.xx.xx.xx（也就是我的ip）
20:03:25[警告]****FAILED　TO BIND TO RORT!
20:03:25[警告]The excption was java.net.BindExeption:Cannot
ed address:JUM_Bind
20:03:25[警告]Perhaps a server is alredy running on that port?
>

replies.author: ttc_V
replies.txt_content:
berry64 发表于 2015-5-30 22:04
在server.properties里面吧ip设置成127.0.0.1
求最佳答案~
是端口被用了改不改都一样 把端口换一个即可。。。25565-60000之间都可以 。

replies.author: erry64
replies.txt_content:
ttc_V 发表于 2015-5-30 22:05
Perhaps a server is alredy running on that port

在server.properties里面吧ip设置成127.0.0.1
求最佳答案~
